title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1290.21 - Names of persons to be notified in event of emergency to be filed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1290.21 - Names of persons to be notified in event of emergency to be filed

State Regulations

Each occupant of space at the World Trade Center shall file
with the Port Authority the name, address and telephone number of at least two
authorized representatives to be notified in the event of an
emergency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1290.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
